overview: Two girls go on a careless hunt to buy marijuana - and end up captives of four maniacal prison escapees. The girls are then subjected to obscene torture.
original_title: The Last House on the Left
tagline: It rests on 13 acres of earth over the very center of hell...!
cast: Sandra Peabody|Lucy Grantham|David Hess|Fred J. Lincoln|Jeramie Rain
